pageTitle: Feel The Piece Ellen Blouse | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 23.5in / 59.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk charmeuse. Lustrous silk charmeuse composes an oversized Feel the Piece button-down. A petite collar and relaxed, dropped shoulder seams complement the boxy silhouette. Vented sides. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Versatility and comfort are the signature elements of Terre Jacobs’s brand Feel The Piece. The simple, yet elegant silhouettes are designed for easy wear, and are cut from luxuriously soft materials. Each piece is made with flexible styling in mind, from reversible construction to perfectly placed pockets and thumbholes at the cuff. Feel The Piece apparel offers relaxed basics that pair effortlessly with casual pieces and tailored profiles alike. See all Feel The Piece reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
